title: Dim sum with dipping sauce
ingredients: ['1 can water chestnuts, about 200 g, drained and chopped', '4 spring onions, thinly sliced', '2 tbsp chopped fresh coriander', '1 tbsp dark soy sauce', '1 tbsp toasted sesame oil', '340 g (12 oz) minced chicken', '1 tsp caster sugar', '1 tbsp finely chopped fresh root ginger', '5 garlic cloves, finely chopped', '30 g (1 oz) fresh shiitake mushrooms, chopped', '1 tbsp cornflour, plus extra for dusting', '50 wonton wrappers', '150 g (5 1/2 oz) kale, Swiss chard or spring greens', 'salt and cayenne pepper', 'Dipping sauce', 'Blend together some hoisin sauce, chopped spring onions, chopped fresh coriander, soy sauce and/or toasted sesame oil.']
